events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it does not fit as expected. I would like to request a refund for the item.
The customer's request for money back has been categorized under Refund for proper handling.
Customer service agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request to proceed further?
My order number is 1234567890. The jacket is too small, and I have decided I do not want to keep it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process and you will receive confirmation once the payment is back to your original method.
Thank you very much for processing my refund quickly. I appreciate your help and clear communication.
Your refund has been successfully processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for the funds to appear in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was confirmed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for reaching out.
